uk.ac.susx.mlcl.lib
Class MemoryUsage

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.susx.mlcl.lib.MemoryUsage

public class MemoryUsage
extends Object

Class to calculate the approximate memory usage of java objects. This implementation uses reflection inspect each object, descending into all composite fields, and analyzing the associated classes.

Author:
Hamish Morgan

protected static class MemoryUsage.Primitive

Constructor Summary
MemoryUsage()
          Construct a new instance of the MemoryProfiler
 
Method Summary
 MemoryUsage add(Object obj)
          Calculate the memory usage of the given object, accumulating the size with any previously added objects.
 MemoryUsage clear()
          Reset the MemoryProfiler object, clearing the caches and setting all size counters back to 0.
 String getInfoString()
          Produce an information string detailing the number of classes and objects seen, with their estimated memory consumption.
 long getInstanceSizeBits()
          Return the summed memory footprint of all instance (non-static) data added objects, in bits.
 long getInstanceSizeBytes()
          Return the summed memory footprint of all instance (non-static) data added objects, in Bytes (rounding up to the nearest byte).
 int getNumClassesSeen()
          Return the number of class types that have been seen by the MemoryProfiler.
 int getNumObjectsSeen()
          Return the number of object instances that have been seen by the MemoryProfiler.
 Set<Class<?>> getSeenClasses()
          Return a set containing all the unique classes that have been seen by this MemoryUsage object.
 Set<Object> getSeenObjects()
          Return a set containing all the unique objects that have been seen by this MemoryUsage object.
 long getSizeBits()
          Return the summed memory footprint of all added objects, both static and instance data, in bits.
 long getSizeBytes()
          Return the summed memory footprint of all added objects, both static and instance data, in bytes (rounding up to the nearest byte).
 long getStaticSizeBits()
          Return the summed memory footprint of all static (non-instance) data added objects, in bits.
 long getStaticSizeBytes()
          Return the summed memory footprint of all static (non-instance) data added objects, in Bytes (rounding up to the nearest byte).
 String toString()

Method Detail

getSizeBits

public long getSizeBits()
Return the summed memory footprint of all added objects, both static and instance data, in bits.

Returns:
bits of both static and instance data seen

getSizeBytes

public long getSizeBytes()
Return the summed memory footprint of all added objects, both static and instance data, in bytes (rounding up to the nearest byte).

Returns:
bytes of both static and instance data seen

getStaticSizeBits

public long getStaticSizeBits()
Return the summed memory footprint of all static (non-instance) data added objects, in bits.

Returns:
bits of instance data seen

getStaticSizeBytes

public long getStaticSizeBytes()
Return the summed memory footprint of all static (non-instance) data added objects, in Bytes (rounding up to the nearest byte).

Returns:
bytes of static data seen

getInstanceSizeBits

public long getInstanceSizeBits()
Return the summed memory footprint of all instance (non-static) data added objects, in bits.

Returns:
bits of instance data seen

getInstanceSizeBytes

public long getInstanceSizeBytes()
Return the summed memory footprint of all instance (non-static) data added objects, in Bytes (rounding up to the nearest byte).

Returns:
bytes of instance data seen

getNumObjectsSeen

public int getNumObjectsSeen()
Return the number of object instances that have been seen by the MemoryProfiler. This will include all objects added, and their non-primitives fields with both static and instance values.

Returns:
number of unique instances seen.

getNumClassesSeen

public int getNumClassesSeen()
Return the number of class types that have been seen by the MemoryProfiler. This will include the class of all objects added, their super-types, and the classes of all fields.

Returns:
number of unique classes seen.

getSeenClasses

public Set<Class<?>> getSeenClasses()
Return a set containing all the unique classes that have been seen by this MemoryUsage object.

Returns:
all seen classes

getSeenObjects

public Set<Object> getSeenObjects()
Return a set containing all the unique objects that have been seen by this MemoryUsage object.

Returns:
all seen classes

getInfoString

public String getInfoString()
Produce an information string detailing the number of classes and objects seen, with their estimated memory consumption.

Returns:
string representation of this object

clear

public MemoryUsage clear()
Reset the MemoryProfiler object, clearing the caches and setting all size counters back to 0.

Returns:
self (for method chaining)
